cast.overview: Father Gabriele Amorth, Chief Exorcist of the Vatican, investigates a young boy's terrifying possession and ends up uncovering a centuries-old conspiracy the Vatican has desperately tried to keep hidden.
cast.title: The Pope's Exorcist

also_known_as: ピーター・デスーザ＝フェイガニー
details.biography: Peter DeSouza-Feighoney was born in 2011 in London, UK. He has Irish and Portuguese heritage and has one sibling. He is an actor and model making his first Hollywood debut in 'The Pope's Exorcist.' Peter is also a 1st Dan Black Belt in Goju Ryu Karate and has opened three Dojos with his Sister and Sensei, one at the Famous Harrow Boys School in London. He coaches kids aged 4-14yrs of different abilities for Gradings and Competitions. Peter has won a multitude of Karate trophies and medals both at competitions Nationally and Internationally. He has modeled for high-end brands and has done runway modeling for London Fashion week including House of Ikons, and many charity fundraisers.
details.name: Peter DeSouza-Feighoney
